mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (title, content, price, hit, link, img, types, username, maker_id) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{price},#{hit},#{link},#{img},#{types},#{username},#{maker_id});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project WHERE maker_id IS NOT NULL AND isdelete='n' AND issoldout='n' ;
SELECT id, title, hit AS hits FROM project ORDER BY hit DESC, id DESC LIMIT 5;
